trans-unit.source: Defines a control and optional event of the control as an asynchronous postback control trigger that causes an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 定義會導致在非同步回傳的控制觸發程序的控制項和控制項的選擇性事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項來重新整理。

trans-unit.source: Use the AsyncPostBackTrigger control to enable controls to be triggers for an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用的觸發程序控制項使用 AsyncPostBackTrigger 控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: Controls that are triggers for an update panel cause a refresh of the panel's content after an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 更新面板的觸發程序的控制項會導致非同步回傳之後重新整理面板的內容。

trans-unit.source: Defining an asynchronous trigger control is useful in the following scenarios: - For controls that are outside a panel.
trans-unit.target: 定義非同步觸發程序控制項是適用於下列情況:-之面板外部的控制項。

trans-unit.source: - For controls that are inside a panel when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: -若為面板內部的控制項時<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>屬性是`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>

trans-unit.source: - For controls that are inside nested panels, in order to cause a refresh of parent panels.
trans-unit.target: -若為位於巢狀面板，以便重新整理的父面板的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control that the AsyncPostBackTrigger control references must be in the same naming container as the update panel for which it is a trigger.
trans-unit.target: 參考 AsyncPostBackTrigger 控制項的控制項必須是相同的命名容器，以更新面板它是觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Triggers that are based on controls in other naming containers are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援其他命名容器中的控制項為基礎的觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Add AsyncPostBackTrigger controls either by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by creating a `Triggers` element declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 將 AsyncPostBackTrigger 控制項使用**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合編輯器**對話方塊設計工具中，或藉由建立`Triggers`項目以宣告方式在<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A> property is required, but the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is optional.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A>屬性是必要的但<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>是選擇性屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is not specified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> attribute of the control is used to determine the default event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>未指定屬性，<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute>控制項的屬性用來判斷預設事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如的預設事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>屬性不區分大小寫。</xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also reference a naming container as a trigger.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以參考的觸發程序的命名容器。

trans-unit.source: In that case, all child controls in the container that cause a postback are considered triggers for the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，所有容器中的子控制項造成回傳會被視為的觸發程序<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: Programmatically adding AsyncPostBackTrigger controls is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援以程式設計方式加入 AsyncPostBackTrigger 控制項。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically register a postback control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式註冊回傳的控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control when the control posts back.
trans-unit.target: 然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制當控制項回傳。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you define a control using both <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> and AsyncPostBackTrigger, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您定義使用這兩個控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>和 AsyncPostBackTrigger，擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls either by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by creating a `Triggers` element declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>控制使用**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合編輯器**對話方塊設計工具中，或藉由建立`Triggers`項目以宣告方式在<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Adding <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls programmatically is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 加入<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>控制項以程式設計的方式不支援。</xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control that triggers an asynchronous postback for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定觸發程序的非同步回傳之控制項的名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A server control ID.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項 id。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postback control event that triggers an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定觸發程序的回傳控制項事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>更新控制項。

trans-unit.source: The EventName property is optional.
trans-unit.target: EventName 屬性是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: If it is not specified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> attribute of the control is used to determine the default event.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute>控制項的屬性用來判斷預設事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists default events for some common ASP.NET 2.0 controls.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出一些常見的 ASP.NET 2.0 控制項的預設事件。

trans-unit.source: |Control|Default event| |-------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>|
trans-unit.target: |控制 |預設事件 | |-------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The event name.
trans-unit.target: 事件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the trigger was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否已叫用觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the HasTriggered method to provide custom logic for determining whether the trigger was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員可以覆寫 HasTriggered 方法以提供自訂邏輯來判斷是否已叫用觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: To see a custom trigger in the `Triggers` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, you can add an directive to the page or to the element of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看自訂觸發程序中的`Triggers`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項，網頁或 Web.config 檔案的項目，您可以加入指示詞。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the trigger was invoked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果叫用觸發程序。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> control and determines whether the event that is named in the trigger exists and is valid.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref>控制項，並判斷是否已在觸發程序中的事件存在而且有效。

trans-unit.source: Raises the event that will trigger a postback and refresh of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會觸發回傳和重新整理<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event sender.
trans-unit.target: 事件發送者。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的字串表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref>控制項。
